question: 西洋
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>Western style</kanji>d <kanji>West</kanji> is still known as <vocabulary>the West</vocabulary>. The one everyone refers to over in Asia when they talk about <vocabulary>Western countries</vocabulary> in Europe and North America. This is the place you'll hear people say you're from if you live in Canada or something.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
